model.dao.interfaces

Interface IGenericDao<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - is an Entity type object
    ID - is and Entity identificator object
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAddressDao, ICourseDao, IDepartmentDao, IFieldOfStudyDao, IGradeDao, IGroupDao, IInstituteDao, ISpecializationDao, IStudentDao, ITeacherDao, ITeachersCoursesDao, IUserDao, IUserDetailsDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddressDao, CourseDao, DepartmentDao, FieldOfStudyDao, GenericDao, GradeDao, GroupDao, InstituteDao, SpecializationDao, StudentDao, TeacherDao, TeachersCoursesDao, UserDao, UserDetailsDao

    public interface IGenericDao<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
    Basic interface for DAO objects using to operations on database. Contains basic operations on database.
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha
